verbs.description: [ARG0: < p >] [ARG0: Top Senate Democrats] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: told] [ARG2: President Donald Trump] [ARG1: not to make a deal that leaves North Korea with nuclear weapons] , and threatened to maintain or toughen sanctions on Pyongyang if that condition is not met.</p >

< p > Top Senate Democrats on Monday told [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-NEG: not] to [V: make] [ARG1: a deal that leaves North Korea with nuclear weapons] , and threatened to maintain or toughen sanctions on Pyongyang if that condition is not met.</p >

< p > Top Senate Democrats on Monday told President Donald Trump not to make [ARG0: a deal] [R-ARG0: that] [V: leaves] [ARG1: North Korea] [ARG2: with nuclear weapons] , and threatened to maintain or toughen sanctions on Pyongyang if that condition is not met.</p >
